code:
s, t, d = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
ws = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
min = ws.inject([0]) {|a, w| a + [a[-1] + w]}.min
week = ws.inject(:+)

if min >= 0
  puts -1
elsif week >= 0
  if s + min > t
    puts -1
  else
    (0..d-1).each do |i|
      s += ws[i]
      if s <= t
        puts i + 1
        break
      end
    end
  end
else
  k = 0
  until s + min <= t
    k += d
    s += week
  end
  (0..d-1).each do |i|
    s += ws[i]
    if s <= t
      puts k + i + 1
      break
    end
  end
end

S,T,D,*w=`dd`.split.map &:to_i
v=[0]
D.times{|i|v[i+1]=v[i]+w[i]}
m=v.min;z=-v[-1]
if i=(0..D).find{|i|S+v[i]<=T}
  p i
elsif z<=0
  p -1
else
  x=z>0?(S+m-T+z-1)/z:0
  p (0..D).find{|i|S-z*x+v[i]<=T}+x*D
end

S, T, D = map(int, input().split())
S -= T
*W, = map(int, input().split())
F = sum(W)
if F >= 0:
    su = S
    for i, w in enumerate(W):
        su += w
        if su <= 0:
            print(i+1)
            break
    else:
        print(-1)
    exit(0)
su = 0
mi = 0
for d in W:
    su += d
    mi = min(mi, su)

k = max((S+mi-F-1) // -F, 0)
S += k*F
for i, w in enumerate(W):
    S += w
    if S <= 0:
        print(i+1+k*D)
        break
else:
    assert 0
